definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Beauty is truth's smile when she look ins her own fgenius in a particular excellent mirror.
sentences.chinese: 美即是道理的含笑，当她在完整的镜子前揽镜自照。

sentences.english: She spent hours admiring herself in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 她用了几个小时对着镜子自我欣赏。

sentences.english: Light colours provide an effective backdrop for pictures or a mirror.
sentences.chinese: 浅色是挂放图画或镜子很有效果的衬托。

sentences.english: She unwrapped the parcel, and took out the mirror it con-tained.
sentences.chinese: 她打开包袱，从里面拿出镜子。

sentences.english: A cloth bag is provided to protect the high mirror finish .
sentences.chinese: 公司也提供一个布袋保护高度的镜子光洁度。

sentences.english: Side mirrors are replaced by external cameras, located above the rear fenders .
sentences.chinese: 一面镜子取代外部摄像机，上方后方垫。

sentences.english: In the mirrors, I find out my true self that could be indentified by others.
sentences.chinese: 镜子，让我可以看到只有别人才能看到的自己。

sentences.english: WE bear witness to ourselves in mirrors.
sentences.chinese: 我们都是在镜子中见证着我们自己。

sentences.english: In the reflection is a paint-by-number horse.
sentences.chinese: 镜子里反射的是一张马的按数字涂颜色的画。

sentences.english: They the new clothes him in front of the .
sentences.chinese: 他们给他在镜子前试试那套新衣服。

sentences.english: We count the number of photos arriving at D1 without the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 我们对没有放入镜子时达D1的光子进行计数。

sentences.english: Write "I love you" on the bathroom mirror with a piece of soap.
sentences.chinese: 用一块肥皂在卫生间里的镜子上写“我爱你”。

sentences.english: For all experiences are a mirror of one's thought-form.
sentences.chinese: 因为所有的经历都是你思想形态的一个镜子。

sentences.english: Vous Mirror is a refreshing take on the design of a mirror.
sentences.chinese: 您的魔镜就是这样一个对于镜子崭新的设计。

sentences.english: He got up abruptly and tried to see himself in the dirty looking- glass over the wash-stand.
sentences.chinese: 他猛然站起身来，想在盟洗台的肮脏镜子里看看自己。

sentences.english: When you graduate, look at themselves in the mirror, saw a old fox.
sentences.chinese: 当你毕业时，照照镜子，看到一只老狐狸。
